verses.verse: וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אָמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> And he said עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> Come up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> thou and Aaron נָדָ֣ב <S%H5070><s%> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu וְשִׁבְעִ֖ים <S%H7657><s%> and seventy מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <S%H7812><s%> and worship מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <S%H7350><s%> ye afar off

וְנִגַּ֨שׁ <S%H5066><s%> alone shall come near מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְבַדּוֹ֙ <S%H905><s%> alone אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> but they shall not come nigh וְהָעָ֕ם <S%H5971><s%> neither shall the people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> go up עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וַיְסַפֵּ֤ר <S%H5608><s%> and told לָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> all the words יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <S%H4941><s%> and all the judgments וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> with one וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַדְּבָרִ֛ים <S%H1697><s%> All the words אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> will we do

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <S%H3789><s%> wrote מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> all the words יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> and rose up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and builded מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> the foot הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> under the hill וּשְׁתֵּ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten מַצֵּבָ֔ה <S%H4676><s%> and twelve pillars לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַעֲרֵי֙ <S%H5288><s%> young men בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּֽעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> which offered עֹלֹ֑ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וַֽיִּזְבְּח֞וּ <S%H2076><s%> and sacrificed זְבָחִ֧ים <S%H2077><s%> offerings שְׁלָמִ֛ים <S%H8002><s%> peace לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פָּרִֽים׃ <S%H6499><s%> of oxen

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> half הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put בָּאַגָּנֹ֑ת <S%H101><s%> [it] in basons וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> and half הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood זָרַ֖ק <S%H2236><s%> he sprinkled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> on the altar

וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> And he took סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> and read בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> in the audience הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and they said כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> All אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> All that the LORD נַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> will we do וְנִשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> and be obedient

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood וַיִּזְרֹ֖ק <S%H2236><s%> and sprinkled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> accordance הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> [it] on the people וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold דַֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> Behold the blood הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> hath made יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> in עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> accordance כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> with you concerning all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> Then went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron נָדָב֙ <S%H5070><s%> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu וְשִׁבְעִ֖ים <S%H7657><s%> and seventy מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּרְא֕וּ <S%H7200><s%> And they saw אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְתַ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under רַגְלָ֗יו <S%H7272><s%> and [there was] under his feet כְּמַעֲשֵׂה֙ <S%H4639><s%> work לִבְנַ֣ת <S%H3840><s%> as it were a paved הַסַּפִּ֔יר <S%H5601><s%> of a sapphire stone וּכְעֶ֥צֶם <S%H6106><s%> and as it were the body הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven לָטֹֽהַר׃ <S%H2892><s%> in [his] clearness

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אֲצִילֵי֙ <S%H678><s%> And upon the nobles בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> he laid יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> not his hand וַֽיֶּחֱזוּ֙ <S%H2372><s%> also they saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and did eat וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> and drink ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses עֲלֵ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> Come up אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> to הָהָ֖רָה <S%H2022><s%> to me into the mount וֶהְיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> and remain שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְאֶתְּנָ֨ה <S%H5414><s%> and be there and I will give לְךָ֜ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֻחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> thee tables הָאֶ֗בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stone וְהַתּוֹרָה֙ <S%H8451><s%> and a law וְהַמִּצְוָ֔ה <S%H4687><s%> and commandments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּתַ֖בְתִּי <S%H3789><s%> which I have written לְהוֹרֹתָֽם׃ <S%H3384><s%> that thou mayest teach

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua מְשָׁרְת֑וֹ <S%H8334><s%> and his minister וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> into the mount הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַזְּקֵנִ֤ים <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said שְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> Tarry לָ֣נוּ בָזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> ye here עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> for us until we come again אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to you וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> unto you and behold Aaron וְחוּר֙ <S%H2354><s%> and Hur עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> you מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> [are] with you if any בַ֥עַל <S%H1167><s%> to do דְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> have any matters יִגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> let him come אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> into the mount וַיְכַ֥ס <S%H3680><s%> covered הֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> and a cloud אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> the mount

וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֤ן <S%H7931><s%> abode כְּבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> And the glory יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> upon mount סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> Sinai וַיְכַסֵּ֥הוּ <S%H3680><s%> covered הֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> and the cloud שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> it six יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> he called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> and the seventh מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הֶעָנָֽן׃ <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud

וּמַרְאֵה֙ <S%H4758><s%> And the sight כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of the glory יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire אֹכֶ֖לֶת <S%H398><s%> [was] like devouring בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> on the top הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mount לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> went מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst הֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> and gat him up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> into the mount וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> and Moses בָּהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> was in the mount אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> and forty לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> nights פ
